resources.string: "A wealthy American business magnate, playboy, and ingenious scientist, Anthony Edward 'Tony' Stark suffers a severe chest injury during a kidnapping."
An ex-convict and electronics expert hired by Stark International, which enables him to steal the Ant-Man suit from Hank Pym who had long since given up the name.
A Serbian American inventor, electrical engineer, mechanical engineer, and futurist who is best known for his contributions to the design of the modern alternating current electricity supply system.
